QuestData.Title: Moose Shootin'
QuestData.Description:
Highmountain is home to wildlife that can't be hunted anywhere else in the world. Tell me, $n, have you ever laid eyes on a moose before?
The roaming Elderhorn may look like gentle giants, but only a fool would underestimate their strength.
They should prove to be a good challenge, even for someone as experienced as you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt Pinerock Elderhorn in Pinerock Basin.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya can't be huntin' Elderhorn if you're lingerin' around camp.
QuestData.RewardText: You've hunted the Highmountain Elderhorn and lived to tell about it. That's not a feat that most can say they've accomplished. Color me impressed.
